A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It was the best star wars movie ever! A lot of Reylo\, a lot of pleasant sensations\, romance\, nostalgia. I was flying for days after the movie. I was in love. True love. Rian Johnson and all the actors gave us a fairy tale in the spirit of old episodes\, really compassionate\, full of empathy\, cozy emotions. Story was really alive.
